data.text: Sure! Here's a simple breakdown of MXTK tokenomics: - **Asset-Backed Tokens**: Each MXTK token is backed 1:1 by verified mineral assets. This means for every token, there's an equivalent value in minerals. - **Global Liquidity**: MXTK allows you to trade mineral wealth on crypto exchanges worldwide, making it easier to access and invest in these assets. - **Pre-Extraction Value**: You can unlock t
